feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.9: Update Ruby Version & Fix Copyright [Broken]
entry.content:
This release produced a broken container version 1.40.9. Please use 1.40.10 instead.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Footer: Fix Copyright Year (#2083) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Update Docker container to Ruby 3.3.1 (#2091) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.9

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.11: Dependencies, Security & Documentation
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • URLs: Document JSON API Passphrase Usage (#2118) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.149.0 to 1.149.1 (#2117) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump i18n from 1.14.4 to 1.14.5 (#2115) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.194.0 to 3.194.1 (#2113) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 (#2112) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.922.0 to 1.924.0 (#2111) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.4 to 0.5.5 (#2109) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump request_store from 1.6.0 to 1.7.0 (#2107) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0 (#2105) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.148.0 to 1.149.0 (#2102) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.193.0 to 3.194.0 (#2101) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.3 to 0.5.4 (#2097) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.31.2 to 1.31.3 (#2096) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.921.0 to 1.922.0 (#2095) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.920.0 to 1.921.0 (#2094) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jbuilder from 2.11.5 to 2.12.0 (#2093) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.13: Rescue Safeties, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Rescue from ActionController::ParameterMissing (#2138) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 (#2139) @dependabot
